attributes.title: CURSED APP
attributes.review: i wanted to see all of the wonderful things 💫President Trump💫 is doing to Make America Great Again, so i didn't believe any of the one-star reviews and continued downloading the app. i know that Lord Oran– i mean Trump is going to get rid of that horrid app TikTok, which is going to be so much better for his rallies. 😻😻 i immediately opened up the app to see the doors and cabinets opening and closing in my home. the lights were flickering on and off. the window blinds were twisting and turning. i knew that this was happening for a reason because President Trump would never do anything to harm his citizens. 🤩✨ i thought i was right because the sun began shining again. after that, the app asked me for my phone number, email, and address, so i entered all of the information for beloved Trump. 🙈 the next day, i got emails and phone calls saying terrible things that made me pass out. i got monstrous pictures in the mail that made me nauseous for a week straight. my family saw these pictures of 🤮 o r a n g e s 🤢 that i left on the kitchen counter after retrieving them from my mailbox, and we all got admitted to the hospital. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. IT IS CURSED!

attributes.title: ~✨Underwhelming✨~
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app at first to support the Donald, but it asked for all kinds of personal info such as my cellphone number which I am weary of giving out, but put in anyways. I have come to find that I have almost 3x as many telemarketing call than before which leads me to believe that this app leaks personal information. Kinda like how the app tiktok supposedly does. The irony in this is rather hilarious seen as he and his administration are banning the app in America shortly after a group of teenagers formed a peaceful protest on the app. (✨We as teenagers scared him into banning our platform because we have power that we don’t know✨)Overall besides the personal info leaks the app was just unsatisfactory and frankly only gave news that the Trump administration has hand picked. (Vote out ~hate~ 2020) I was underwhelmed as a loyal Trump supporter to find that this app was neither helpful, nor entertaining. (🧚🏻‍♀️Being Pro life means being anti police brutality and against children in cages being separated from their families🧚🏻‍♀️) I’ll close with this. The vibes were FAR from immaculate :,( 
Because of these reasons I believe this app deserves a one star.

attributes.title: I now have chronic depression
attributes.review: I got this app at first because I wanted to see if trump is saying something different on his app, however when I got this app I started to feel strange. Almost the moment I opened it I was watching my life from my eyes, but I wasn’t living it. I then found that all my waking minutes were spent trying to get to a spray tanner, and trying to buy a crappy toupee. One afternoon, I read on the app eliminate your sister. I was confused but I couldn’t do anything. Then I went to my sister and I attempted to strangle her. Luckily she escaped my hold and ran away. I knew I had to do something but the thing that was controlling me was so strong. When I went to grab my phone it wasn’t there. I frantically looked everywhere but I couldn’t find it. Then I found that in my haste to find my sister my phone was dangling off the edge of a window. When I went to grab my phone it fell and landed on a pedestrian. I don’t know how the app did this to me, but you must heed my warning. I now have two lawsuits (from the pedestrian and my sister) one broken phone, hundreds of toupees and non-refundable spray tan appointments, and chronic depression.

attributes.title: ello orange cheeto🙈🟠✨
attributes.review: I wanted to support my orange cheeto but the app was sooo slow !!🥱 I spent days and nights watching the app load .. I have good service so I don’t see why I couldn’t support my orange spray tan queen 👑🙈🟠 we should just take down the app and not put it back up since it’s glitching wayy too much🤩🙌🏼 I LOvE the hair👩🏿‍🦰 it’s so pReTtY🧠🧠 I love to support someone who takes PaREnTs away from their chiLDreN 👶🙈 it’s so fun see them not have parents and having to live on the streets !👁👅👁 having a orange cheeto as a president shows how blessed aMeRica is🤩 it’s just great how trans people can’t live the way they want🙀 instead the orange cheeto wants to “pARtneR” with doctors and companies to find out who’s trans and need medical treatment so he can cAnCEl them🧩💥 what a world we live in !! it’s not like Hispanics are being treated poorly and not getting rights the everyone should have⚡️🥇you know , police brutality is so normal and should definitely being a thing ! no need to take care of it🚨🚦overall there is too much glitching and all I wanted to do is be a good american citizen and vote for the orange cheeto🗺🚁 muy bien pero tu puedes hacer un mejor trabajo🤪💗adios orange cheeto👋🏿🙈✨🟠

attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE!!!!!
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!! AS SOON AS I DOWNLOADED THE APP, MY PHONE SCREEN TURNED ORANGE. 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊I HAD TO GO TO THE APPLE STORE AND GET NY PHONE COMPLETELY REPLACED. NOT TO MENTION, MY FAMILY DISOWNED ME FOR DOWNLOADING THE APP. OF COURSE, I WOULD NEVER NEVER EVER IN MY RIGHT MIND VOTE FOR THIS CHEESEBALL BUT I WAS CURIOUS TO SEE WHAT HIS APP WAS ALL ABOUT AND SEE ALL THE STUPIDITY IN IT. BUT MY PARENTS DISOWNED ME BECAUSE OF IT 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭in all seriousness, donald trump is a nuisance to america and the world. HE IS SEXIST, HOMOPHOBIC, ANTI-SCIENCE, and so much more!!!! not to mention he is also a CHILD RAPIST. i truly cannot fathom how people can have such pea sized brains to actually think it’s a good idea to vote for him. every time he opens his mouth he spits out the most idiotic statements a person could ever make. also for those republicans who think he cares about you...YEARS AGO HE LITERALLY SAID THAT IF HE EVER RAN FOR PRESIDENT, HE WOULD RUN AS A REPUBLICAN BECAUSE THEY’RE THE DUMBEST PARTY...donald trump is tearing america apart. i cannot put all the hate i have for him into words because there is too much to say. the last thing to say is this. DONALD TRUMP IS A DANGER TO SOCIETY. WE MUST VOTE HIM OUT!!!!!

attributes.title: disgustipating - nasty and makes me 🤢
attributes.review:
immediately after I downloaded this app it kept stalking me and taking pictures of my face through the front camera and then after that i tried to delete it but it wouldn’t let me and kept saying “oops we can’t do that unless you vote for trump” (when i never have even voted for certain reasons.) i then started to turn my phone off and it wouldn’t do so because trump 2020 kept spamming pictures of oompa loompas and carrots and obama. when i finally turned my phone off i hoped the app would go away but it didn’t, and i realized it hacked every single app on my phone. i started to cry and realized my dog got loose and when he came home my poor kenny was literally spray painted and when i tried to bathe him the app turned off my water for not liking it then my moms car would not start and then it kept screaming at me and laughing then i finally got it off of my phone after 2 weeks and all of the problems went away! totally don’t recommend. i give it a  -♾/0  but this stupid review site wouldn’t let me go any lower #soannoying. 
don’t ban tik tok or gen z will ban this 💘🥰

attributes.title: Ugly and fat paranormal Cheeto activity
attributes.review: When I first got the app was when it started happening. I was living my life feeding my pet coffee bean until I heard a strange noise😱 in one of my furnaces where my mom lives.  I opened the furnace to see a stinky ugly 🤢fat orange🤮 disgusting petrifying terrible 😱terrifying CHEETO ...As the days went on I kept seeing this stinky ugly fat orange 🤢disgusting 🤮petrifying terrible terrifying😱 CHEETO every time I opened the app  so I went to McDonald’s and bought a baconator as I flew my pet tornado home I noticed a strange smell but didn’t really think of anything cuz I thought it was just my pet hippo taking a poo poo BUT it wasn’t when I got to the trap house MY BACONATOR WAS GONE 😱I tried using my phone to call it but I guess it’s ringer was off 😥so I decided to play subway surfer on my phone 😔and all of a sudden my pet helicopter told me to open this app that I had recently got ..🤨When it opened I saw the ugly fat petrifying terrible terrifying orange Cheeto eating my baconator on the screen😱😨 .THATS WHEN I HAD ENOUGH👺👺,I then deleted the app and noticed all the paranormal Cheeto activity had stopped😺. So don’t download the app it’s bad👁👄👁🌳🌳🌳🌳💀💀💀💀💀🐔🐔🐔

attributes.title: THIS WAS CREEPY 😰😭😡
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app so I could be the best American I could be 🇺🇸 you know supporting my non-homophobic, non- racist, always caring president but the app took forever to download questions keep popping on my phone for no reason the app drained my phone battery 😡 and on top of that it keep opening my front camera every 5 mins 😭 I was getting creeped out cuz it ended up happening in the shower my music stopped and everything and when I got out the shower to check it out my front camera snapped a picture I went quickly to my phone to delete it but when I got to my phone the picture was already gone and sent 😭😭😭 I’m a good Christian woman who isn’t homosexual and I’m not racist but I would never do anything like this I felt very uncomfortable leaving this app on my phone from it asking random questions like what’s your favorite sexy dress? 😥 too it draining my battery to almost near death....😢😭 to it taking random pictures of me when I workout or when I get out the shower I don’t like this one bit 💀💀💀😂
Signed by someone whose “definitely not apart of the LGBT 🏳️‍🌈 and is “definitely white” 👩🏾

attributes.title: She needs to find a hobby✨🏳️‍🌈🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.review: This app deserves -70 stars, not even -69. I opened the app and was immediately greeted with a bright flashing screen with a black spiral in the center. I could not look away from it and soon I began to think unsavory thoughts. I could only think in “Trump 2020🇺🇸”, “❄️”, “I’m not racist bc I have a black friend” statements for every possible and slightly political scenario. Within the following days, I began to lose all sense of personal awareness and self control over my emotions, thoughts, and physicality's. I could not procure evidence for my political agenda that I though was necessary to push onto unsuspecting victims on the daily. Instead, I would use those previously listed lines and say very thinly veiled racist remarks towards people to make them cry, when in reality, they just looked at me like I was INSANE. Now, I have no friends except for one very pasty white guy who stands in the corner of my room who aggressively hates homosexuality while denying his own. All in all, this app has ruined my life, liberty, and pursuit of happiness. I would not recommend this on my worst enemy. 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣

attributes.title: this app gave me physical hives✨🧚🏻‍♀️🦋
attributes.review: i downloaded this app like any self respecting american, only for my phone to glitch HORRENDOUSLY. the app stole my phone number, now all i get are calls from donald asking if his tan resembles a leaf on an autumn day or at least a sunset in july; it hurts me to tell him otherwise. somehow the app crashed Siri? what used to be my gal pal voice assistant is now a monotonous robot that can only recite the national anthem and Smash Mouth’s 2001 hit song “All Star”. sometimes i’m NOT the sharpest tool in the shed, but i don’t need Siri telling me that daily😔 the app weirdly requires an absurdly long password. i tried pi but i had to settle for -♾> ♾ and at least that worked. upon registering for an account, the app asked for my blood type? that’s so strange... it’s red of course! life has never been the same since i’ve downloaded this app. my cholesterol is through the roof and i’ve lost the ability to beat box. the latter might be my fault, but trump wasn’t there to support me; which i thought he’d do upon my downloading of the app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD unless you want your life to do the hokey pokey and turn itself around for the worst!!!
